doc.field: The series consists of photographs, contact sheets, negatives, developed film, slides, photocopies of photographs, and a small amount of correspondence. Photographs document Henry R. Luce (hereafter HRL) as a child with family members, in China, as a student at Yale, with classmates, working, relaxing, with his son Henry Luce III, mingling with individuals at conferences, receptions and other events, speaking on stage, and on his trips. Notable individuals with HRL include Winston Churchill, Chiang Kai-shek, Harry S. Truman, Dwight D. Eisenhower, Richard Nixon, John and Jackie Kennedy, Lyndon B. Johnson (including an original autographed photo), Konrad Adenauer, Ludwig Erhard, Pope Pius XII, Mohammad Reza Pahlavi (the Shah of Iran), Gamal Abdel Nasser, Ramon Magsaysay, Mario Scelba, David Sarnoff, Ngo Dinh Diem, Alberto Lleras Camargo, Bob Hope, General MacArthur, Josip Broz Tito, and Nelson Rockefeller.
